attributes.action: Cancel rent and mortgage payments during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Government must provide support to vulnerable groups of the society
attributes.background: Help people in hardship by suspending rent and mortgages

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
